name: INPayBillIntentResponseCode
desc: Constants indicating the state of the response.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.

items.name: case unspecified
items.desc: The response didn’t specify a response code.

items.name: case ready
items.desc: You’re ready to handle the intent.

items.name: case inProgress
items.desc: You’ve received the payment details and are in the process of scheduling the transaction.

items.name: case failure
items.desc: You were unable to schedule the transaction.

items.name: case failureRequiringAppLaunch
items.desc: The user must launch your app to schedule the transaction.

items.name: case failureCredentialsUnverified
items.desc: The transaction failed because you were unable to verify the credentials of the user or the payee.

items.name: case failureInsufficientFunds
items.desc: The transaction failed because the user’s account didn’t contain sufficient funds.
